notes: Length not continuous on infinite lists
The functional whose fixed point is factorial

notation: λf.λn.if n≤1 then n else f(n-1)+f(n-2)
notes: The functional whose fixed point is fibonacci

notation: λf.λn.if n=0 then true else f(n-1)

notes: Omega denotes ⊥ in the reflexive domain
Functional for Ackermann - not primitive recursive
